location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Captain David Seton, Resident at Muscat

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has slightly obscured some of the body of the letter in places. As a result some of the text can be a little tricky to read.

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement and reply to a communication dated 19 February 1808. It notes that the Resident has forwarded to Captain John Ferrier the most recent intelligence he has received from Bombay via the HCC Teignmouthand cautions that sending communications over land routes cannot be relied upon.
